label: RecordedStatus
comment: Recorded information relevant to a condition or a position of an object.

datatypeProperties.comment: The date, time, date time, or other date time value when this recorded status changed.
The name of the person or system, expressed as text, that changed this recorded status.
The code specifying the condition for this recorded status.

referencedBy.comment: A changed recorded status for this basic work item.
